title: Secure and Reliable Wireless Private Network Facilitates Digital Transformation of Power Distribution and Consumption - Huawei Enterprise
summary: 1. Huawei's Smart Grid eLTE Private Network Solution is a secure and reliable wireless private network that can be used for the digital transformation of power distribution and consumption.   2. The solution enables ubiquitous power IoT for all services and supports various services such as distribution automation, precise load control, station environment monitoring, power quality monitoring, and video security.   3. The solution has been successfully implemented by a customer in Eastern China, enabling hundreds of thousands of power distribution terminals to access the network and significantly improving the quality of power supply services.
green_innovation: TRUE, the solution contributes to environmental sustainability goals by enabling the digital transformation of power distribution and consumption, which can lead to increased energy efficiency and reduced greenhouse gas emissions.
